column4: I have a device that is busy , how can i remove eveything that is using it? its an onboard webcam
kill the pid of the device and it should release the other programs.
arg.. what do you think is grabbing it?
what happens when you try to unmount it?
and when i try to mout it says the same thing
but if i do a ls /dev/video*
so what makes you think something is using it?
it was a program called motion
what kind of machine is this?
